input.sentences: the lowenbrau building had many interesting characters .
the hamburger was take a little too literally here .
the building was lit up beautifully with the decor .
th pink display fit in perfect at the fair .
the swinging ride was lit up beautifully at night .
output.sentences: Lowenbrau, unique due to the colorful cast of characters on the building, is what welcomes eager carnival goers.
The favorite lunch stop features a sign that depicts a cow literally inside a hamburger bun, but it's known for its deep fried asparagus.
The first building lit at dusk features decor depicting scenes from favorite fairy tales on the outside of the building.
The giant pink bounce house is a perfect attraction to fit in before the closing firework display.
Visitors know that a round on the swinging ride is the perfect way to end the night!
